content: crochet patterns by penny peberdy wedding favour or christmas tree bags yarn anchor arista or twilley s goldfingering hook 2 50 mm abbreviations slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet double crochet half_double_crochet half-treble treble_crochet treble space - space method 1 make a circle with the yarn and work 2ch 12tr into it slip_stitch to 1st treble_crochet to join 2 2ch for height 2tr into ea treble_crochet of prev row 3 2ch for height work 2tr 1tr alternately into ea st to end slip_stitch to join 4 work 1 row double_crochet 5 with the right side facing and working from behind the sts work 1tr into each double_crochet of prev row thus makes the tops of the double_crochet stitches into a stand-out edging and forming a decorative edge to the base of the bag 6 work 1tr in ea st 36 sts work 5 more row in treble_crochet drawstring row 1 work 2ch for height 1tr into first st *1ch miss 1 st 1tr in next st repeat from * to end slip_stitch to join 2 work 1tr into ea st and chain space 36 sts 3 work 1 double_crochet 2ch into each st slip_stitch to join fasten_off and sew in the end drawstrings make 2 twisted cords each from 2m of yarn thread through the drawstring row in opposite directions knot the ends of each cord together and cut to form a tassel effect © penny peberdy 2004 page 1
